title: Central Lincoln Stay Located Along Brayford Waterfront
description: Spend time in England's oldest inland harbour with a stay at Holiday Inn Lincoln, an IHG Hotel. Occupying a prime slice of real estate along Brayford Waterfront, this modern escape places you just seconds from all the action, with the city's best restaurants, bars and coffee shops at your doorstep. After a day exploring medieval cathedrals and heritage architecture, head back to the hotel for a meal at Brayford View restaurant and tuck into fresh, modern cuisine while overlooking the river.
location_description: Holiday Inn Lincoln, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Brayford Wharf North, Lincoln LN1 1YW, United Kingdom
